   20: -module(erpc_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: -export([call/1, call_against_old_node/1,
   25:          call_from_old_node/1,
   26:          call_reqtmo/1, call_against_ei_node/1,
   27: 	 call_always_spawn/1, cast/1,
   28:          send_request/1, send_request_fun/1,
   29:          send_request_receive_reqtmo/1,
   30:          send_request_wait_reqtmo/1,
   31:          send_request_check_reqtmo/1,
   32:          send_request_against_ei_node/1,
   33:          send_request_receive_reqid_collection/1,
   34:          send_request_wait_reqid_collection/1,
   35:          send_request_check_reqid_collection/1,
   36:          multicall/1, multicall_reqtmo/1,
   37:          multicall_recv_opt/1,
   38:          multicall_recv_opt2/1,
   39:          multicall_recv_opt3/1,
   40: 	 multicall_always_spawn/1,
   41:          multicast/1,
   42:          timeout_limit/1]).
   43: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   44: 
   45: -export([call_test/4]).
   46: 
   47: -export([call_func1/1, call_func2/1, call_func4/4]).
   48: 
   49: -export([f/0, f2/0]).
   50: 
   51: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   52: 
   53: -ifndef(CT_PEER).
   54: %% This module needs to compile on old nodes...
   55: -define(CT_PEER(), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   56: -define(CT_PEER(Opts), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   57: -define(CT_PEER_REL(Opts, Release, PrivDir), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   58: -endif.
   59: 
   60: suite() ->
   61:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   62:      {timetrap,{minutes,2}}].
   63: 
   64: all() ->
   65:     [call,
   66:      call_against_old_node,
   67:      call_from_old_node,
   68:      call_reqtmo,
   69:      call_against_ei_node,
   70:      call_always_spawn,
   71:      cast,
   72:      send_request,
   73:      send_request_fun,
   74:      send_request_receive_reqtmo,
   75:      send_request_wait_reqtmo,
   76:      send_request_check_reqtmo,
   77:      send_request_against_ei_node,
   78:      send_request_receive_reqid_collection,
   79:      send_request_wait_reqid_collection,
   80:      send_request_check_reqid_collection,
   81:      multicall,
   82:      multicall_reqtmo,
   83:      multicall_recv_opt,
   84:      multicall_recv_opt2,
   85:      multicall_recv_opt3,
   86:      multicall_always_spawn,
   87:      multicast,
   88:      timeout_limit].
   89: 
   90: groups() -> 
   91:     [].
   92: 
   93: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) when is_atom(Func), is_list(Config) ->
   94:     [{testcase, Func}|Config].
   95: 
   96: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Config) ->
   97:     ok.
   98: 
   99: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  100:     Config.
  101: 
  102: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  103:     ok.
  104: 
  105: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  106:     Config.
  107: 
  108: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  109:     Config.
  110: 
  111: call(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  112:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  113:     call_test(Peer, Node, true, false).
  114: 
  115: call_against_old_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  116:     {OldRelName, OldRel} = old_release(),
  117:     case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0},
  118:                       OldRelName,
  119:                       proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
  120:         not_available ->
  121:             {skipped, "Not able to start an OTP "++OldRel++" node"};
  122:         {ok, Peer, Node} ->
  123:             compile_and_load_on_node(Node),
  124:             call_test(Peer, Node, false, false),
  125:             ok
  126:     end.
  127: 
  128: call_from_old_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  129:     {OldRelName, OldRel} = old_release(),
  130:     case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0},
  131:                       OldRelName,
  132:                       proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
  133:         not_available ->
  134:             {skipped, "Not able to start an OTP "++OldRel++" node"};
  135:         {ok, Peer, Node} ->
  136:             try
  137:                 compile_and_load_on_node(Node),
  138:                 ok = erpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, call_test, [undefined, node(), false, true])
  139:             after
  140:                 peer:stop(Peer)
  141:             end
  142:     end.
  143: 
  144: call_test(Peer, Node, NodesOfSameRelease, ToTestServer) ->
  145:     if NodesOfSameRelease ->
  146:             call_test(Peer, node(), 10000, NodesOfSameRelease, ToTestServer),
  147:             call_test(Peer, node(), infinity, NodesOfSameRelease, ToTestServer),
  148:             try
  149:                 erpc:call(node(), timer, sleep, [100], 10),
  150:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  151:             catch
  152:                 error:{erpc, timeout} ->
  153:                     ok
  154:             end,
  155:             try
  156:                 erpc:call(node(), fun () -> timer:sleep(100) end, 10),
  157:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  158:             catch
  159:                 error:{erpc, timeout} ->
  160:                     ok
  161:             end;
  162:        true ->
  163:             ok
  164:     end,
  165:     call_test(Peer, Node, 10000, NodesOfSameRelease, ToTestServer),
  166:     call_test(Peer, Node, infinity, NodesOfSameRelease, ToTestServer),
  167:     try
  168:         erpc:call(Node, timer, sleep, [100], 10),
  169:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  170:     catch
  171:         error:{erpc, timeout} ->
  172:             ok
  173:     end,
  174:     if NodesOfSameRelease ->
  175:             try
  176:                 erpc:call(Node, fun () -> timer:sleep(100) end, 10),
  177:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  178:             catch
  179:                 error:{erpc, timeout} ->
  180:                     ok
  181:             end;
  182:        true ->
  183:             ok
  184:     end,
  185:     if not ToTestServer ->
  186:             try
  187:                 erpc:call(Node, erlang, halt, []),
  188:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  189:             catch
  190:                 error:{erpc, noconnection} ->
  191:                     ok
  192:             end,
  193:             if NodesOfSameRelease ->
  194:                     try
  195:                         erpc:call(Node, fun () -> erlang:node() end),
  196:                         ct:fail(unexpected)
  197:                     catch
  198:                         error:{erpc, noconnection} ->
  199:                             ok
  200:                     end;
  201:                true ->
  202:                     ok
  203:             end,
  204:             try
  205:                 erpc:call(Node, erlang, node, []),
  206:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  207:             catch
  208:                 error:{erpc, noconnection} ->
  209:                     ok
  210:             end;
  211:        true ->
  212:             ok
  213:     end,
  214:     try
  215:         erpc:call(badnodename, erlang, node, []),
  216:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  217:     catch
  218:         error:{erpc, noconnection} ->
  219:             ok
  220:     end,
  221: 
  222:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  223:     [] = flush([]),
  224:     ok.
  225: 
  226: call_test(Peer, Node, Timeout, NodesOfSameRelease, ToTestServer) ->
  227:     io:format("call_test(~p, ~p, ~p, ~p, ~p)~n",
  228:               [Peer, Node, Timeout, NodesOfSameRelease, ToTestServer]),
  229:     Node = erpc:call(Node, erlang, node, [], Timeout),
  230:     try
  231:         erpc:call(Node, erlang, error, [oops|invalid], Timeout),
  232:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  233:     catch
  234:         error:{exception, badarg, [{erlang,apply,[erlang,error,[oops|invalid]],_}]} ->
  235:             ok
  236:     end,
  237:     try
  238:         erpc:call(Node, erlang, error, [oops], Timeout),
  239:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  240:     catch
  241:         error:{exception, oops, [{erlang,error,[oops],_}]} ->
  242:             ok
  243:     end,
  244:     try
  245:         erpc:call(Node, erlang, exit, [oops], Timeout),
  246:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  247:     catch
  248:         exit:{exception, oops} ->
  249:             ok
  250:     end,
  251:     if NodesOfSameRelease ->
  252:             try
  253:                 erpc:call(Node, fun () -> erlang:exit(oops) end, Timeout),
  254:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  255:             catch
  256:                 exit:{exception, oops} ->
  257:                     ok
  258:             end;
  259:        true ->
  260:             ok
  261:     end,
  262:     try
  263:         erpc:call(Node, erlang, throw, [oops], Timeout),
  264:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  265:     catch
  266:         throw:oops ->
  267:             ok
  268:     end,
  269:     if NodesOfSameRelease ->
  270:             try
  271:                 erpc:call(Node, fun () -> erlang:throw(oops) end, Timeout),
  272:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  273:             catch
  274:                 throw:oops ->
  275:                     ok
  276:             end,
  277:             case {node() == Node, Timeout == infinity} of
  278:                 {true, true} ->
  279:                     %% This would kill the test since local calls
  280:                     %% without timeout is optimized to execute in
  281:                     %% calling process itself...
  282:                     ok;
  283:                 _ ->
  284:                     ExitSignal = fun () ->
  285:                                          exit(self(), oops),
  286:                                          receive after infinity -> ok end
  287:                                  end,
  288:                     try
  289:                         erpc:call(Node, ExitSignal, Timeout),
  290:                         ct:fail(unexpected)
  291:                     catch
  292:                         exit:{signal, oops} ->
  293:                             ok
  294:                     end,
  295:                     try
  296:                         erpc:call(Node, erlang, apply, [ExitSignal, []], Timeout),
  297:                         ct:fail(unexpected)
  298:                     catch
  299:                         exit:{signal, oops} ->
  300:                             ok
  301:                     end
  302:             end;
  303:        true ->
  304:             ok
  305:     end,
  306:     try
  307:         erpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, call_func1, [boom], Timeout),
  308:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  309:     catch
  310:         error:{exception,
  311:                {exception,
  312:                 boom,
  313:                 [{?MODULE, call_func3, A2, _},
  314:                  {?MODULE, call_func2, 1, _}]},
  315:                [{erpc, call, A1, _},
  316:                 {?MODULE, call_func1, 1, _}]}
  317:           when ((A1 == 5)
  318:                 orelse (A1 == [Node, ?MODULE, call_func2, [boom]]))
  319:                andalso ((A2 == 1)
  320:                         orelse (A2 == [boom])) ->
  321:             ok
  322:     end,
  323:     if NodesOfSameRelease ->
  324:             try
  325:                 erpc:call(Node, fun () -> ?MODULE:call_func1(boom) end, Timeout),
  326:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  327:             catch
  328:                 error:{exception,
  329:                        {exception,
  330:                         boom,
  331:                         [{?MODULE, call_func3, A4, _},
  332:                          {?MODULE, call_func2, 1, _}]},
  333:                        [{erpc, call, A3, _},
  334:                         {?MODULE, call_func1, 1, _},
  335:                         {erlang, apply, 2, _}]}
  336:                   when ((A3 == 5)
  337:                         orelse (A3 == [Node, ?MODULE, call_func2, [boom]]))
  338:                        andalso ((A4 == 1)
  339:                                 orelse (A4 == [boom])) ->
  340:                     ok
  341:             end;
  342:        true ->
  343:             ok
  344:     end,
  345:     try
  346:         call_func4(Node, node(), 10, Timeout),
  347:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  348:     catch
  349:         error:Error1 ->
  350: %%%            io:format("Error1=~p~n", [Error1]),
  351:             check_call_func4_error(Error1, 10)
  352:     end,
  353:     try
  354:         call_func4(node(), Node, 5, Timeout),
  355:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  356:     catch
  357:         error:Error2 ->
  358: %%%            io:format("Error2=~p~n", [Error2]),
  359:             check_call_func4_error(Error2, 5)
  360:     end,
  361:     ok.
  362: 
  363: check_call_func4_error({exception,
  364:                          badarg,
  365:                          [{?MODULE, call_func5, _, _},
  366:                           {?MODULE, call_func4, _, _}]},
  367:                          0) ->
  368:     ok;
  369: check_call_func4_error({exception,
  370:                         Exception,
  371:                         [{erpc, call, _, _},
  372:                          {?MODULE, call_func5, _, _},
  373:                          {?MODULE, call_func4, _, _}]},
  374:                        N) ->
  375:     check_call_func4_error(Exception, N-1).
  376:     
  377: call_func1(X) ->
  378:     erpc:call(node(), ?MODULE, call_func2, [X]),
  379:     ok.
  380: 
  381: call_func2(X) ->
  382:     call_func3(X),
  383:     ok.
  384: 
  385: call_func3(X) ->
  386:     erlang:error(X, [X]).
  387:     
  388: call_func4(A, B, N, T) ->
  389:     call_func5(A, B, N, T),
  390:     ok.
  391: 
  392: call_func5(A, B, N, T) when N >= 0 ->
  393:     erpc:call(A, ?MODULE, call_func4, [B, A, N-1, T], T),
  394:     ok;
  395: call_func5(_A, _B, _N, _T) ->
  396:     erlang:error(badarg).
  397: 
  398: call_against_ei_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  399:     {ok, Node} = start_ei_node(Config),
  400:     %% Once when erpc:call() brings up the connection
  401:     %% and once when the connection is up...
  402:     disconnect(Node),
  403:     try
  404:         erpc:call(Node, erlang, node, []),
  405:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  406:     catch
  407:         error:{erpc, notsup} ->
  408:             ok
  409:     end,
  410:     true = lists:member(Node, nodes(hidden)),
  411:     try
  412:         erpc:call(Node, erlang, node, []),
  413:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  414:     catch
  415:         error:{erpc, notsup} ->
  416:             ok
  417:     end,
  418:     ok = stop_ei_node(Node).
  419: 
  420: call_reqtmo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  421:     Fun = fun (Node, SendMe, Timeout) ->
  422:                   try
  423:                       erpc:call(Node, erlang, send,
  424:                                 [self(), SendMe], Timeout),
  425:                       ct:fail(unexpected)
  426:                   catch
  427:                       error:{erpc, timeout} -> ok
  428:                   end
  429:           end,
  430:     reqtmo_test(Fun).
  431: 
  432: reqtmo_test(Test) ->
  433:     %% Tests that we time out in time also when the request itself
  434:     %% does not get through. A typical issue we have had
  435:     %% in the past, is that the timeout has not triggered until
  436:     %% the request has gotten through...
  437:     
  438:     Timeout = 500,
  439:     WaitBlock = 100,
  440:     BlockTime = 1000,
  441: 
  442:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  443: 
  444:     erpc:call(Node, erts_debug, set_internal_state, [available_internal_state,
  445:                                                      true]),
  446:     
  447:     SendMe = make_ref(),
  448: 
  449:     erpc:cast(Node, erts_debug, set_internal_state, [block, BlockTime]),
  450:     receive after WaitBlock -> ok end,
  451:     
  452:     Start = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  453: 
  454:     Test(Node, SendMe, Timeout),
  455: 
  456:     Stop = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  457:     Time = erlang:convert_time_unit(Stop-Start, native, millisecond),
  458:     io:format("Actual time: ~p ms~n", [Time]),
  459:     true = Time >= Timeout,
  460:     true = Time =< Timeout + 200,
  461:     
  462:     receive SendMe -> ok end,
  463:     
  464:     receive UnexpectedMsg -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, UnexpectedMsg})
  465:     after 0 -> ok
  466:     end,
  467:     
  468:     peer:stop(Peer),
  469:     
  470:     {comment,
  471:      "Timeout = " ++ integer_to_list(Timeout)
  472:      ++ " Actual = " ++ integer_to_list(Time)}.
  473: 
  474: call_always_spawn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  475:     case self() =:= erpc:call(node(), erlang, self, [],
  476: 			      #{timeout => infinity,
  477: 				always_spawn => false}) of
  478: 	true ->
  479: 	    false = self() =:= erpc:call(node(), erlang, self, [],
  480: 					#{timeout => infinity,
  481: 					  always_spawn => true}),
  482: 	    ok;
  483: 	false ->
  484: 	    {skip, local_call_spawned}
  485:     end.
  486: 
  487: cast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  488:     %% silently fail
  489:     ok = erpc:cast(badnodename, erlang, send, [hej]),
  490: 
  491:     try
  492:         erpc:cast(<<"node">>, erlang, send, [hej]),
  493:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  494:     catch
  495:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
  496:     end,
  497:     try
  498:         erpc:cast(node(), erlang, send, hej),
  499:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  500:     catch
  501:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
  502:     end,
  503:     try
  504:         erpc:cast(node(), "erlang", send, [hej]),
  505:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  506:     catch
  507:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
  508:     end,
  509:     try
  510:         erpc:cast(node(), erlang, make_ref(), [hej]),
  511:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  512:     catch
  513:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
  514:     end,
  515: 
  516:     erpc:cast(node(), erlang, send, [self()|blupp]), %% silent remote error...
  517: 
  518:     Me = self(),
  519:     Ok1 = make_ref(),
  520:     ok = erpc:cast(node(), erlang, send, [Me, {mfa, Ok1}]),
  521:     receive
  522:         {mfa, Ok1} -> ok
  523:     end,
  524:     ok = erpc:cast(node(), fun () -> Me ! {a_fun, Ok1} end),
  525:     receive
  526:         {a_fun, Ok1} -> ok
  527:     end,
  528:     {ok, _Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  529:     Ok2 = make_ref(),
  530:     ok = erpc:cast(Node, erlang, send, [Me, {mfa, Ok2}]),
  531:     receive
  532:         {mfa, Ok2} -> ok
  533:     end,
  534:     ok = erpc:cast(Node, fun () -> Me ! {a_fun, Ok2} end),
  535:     receive
  536:         {a_fun, Ok2} -> ok
  537:     end,
  538: 
  539:     ok = erpc:cast(Node, erlang, halt, []),
  540: 
  541:     monitor_node(Node, true),
  542:     receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end,
  543: 
  544:     ok = erpc:cast(Node, erlang, send, [Me, wont_reach_me]),
  545: 
  546:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  547:     [] = flush([]),
  548: 
  549:     {ok, EiNode} = start_ei_node(Config),
  550:     %% Both when erpc:cast() brings up the connection
  551:     %% and when the connection is up...
  552:     disconnect(EiNode),
  553: 
  554:     ok = erpc:cast(EiNode, erlang, send, [Me, wont_reach_me]),
  555:     ok = erpc:cast(EiNode, fun () -> Me ! wont_reach_me end),
  556: 
  557:     wait_until(fun () -> lists:member(EiNode, nodes(hidden)) end),
  558:     
  559:     ok = erpc:cast(EiNode, erlang, send, [Me, wont_reach_me]),
  560:     ok = erpc:cast(EiNode, fun () -> Me ! wont_reach_me end),
  561: 
  562:     receive
  563:         Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg})
  564:     after
  565:         2000 -> ok
  566:     end,
  567:     ok = stop_ei_node(EiNode),
  568: 
  569:     {OldRelName, OldRel} = old_release(),
  570:     case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0},
  571:                       OldRelName,
  572:                       proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
  573:         not_available ->
  574:             {comment, "Not tested against OTP "++OldRel++" node"};
  575:         {ok, _OldPeer, OldNode} ->
  576:             Ok3 = make_ref(),
  577:             ok = erpc:cast(OldNode, erlang, send, [Me, {mfa, Ok3}]),
  578:             receive
  579:                 {mfa, Ok3} -> ok
  580:             end,
  581:             ok = erpc:cast(OldNode, erlang, halt, []),
  582: 
  583:             ok = erpc:cast(OldNode, erlang, send, [Me, wont_reach_me]),
  584: 
  585:             receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  586:             [] = flush([]),
  587:             {comment, "Also tested against OTP "++OldRel++" node"}
  588:     end.
  589: 
  590: send_request(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  591:     %% Note: First part of nodename sets response delay in seconds.
  592:     {ok, _Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(["-erpc_test_delay", "1"]),
  593:     {ok, _Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(["-erpc_test_delay", "10"]),
  594:     {ok, _Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(["-erpc_test_delay", "20"]),
  595:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(Node1, ?MODULE, f, []),
  596:     ReqId2 = erpc:send_request(Node2, ?MODULE, f, []),
  597:     ReqId3 = erpc:send_request(Node3, ?MODULE, f, []),
  598:     ReqId4 = erpc:send_request(Node1, erlang, error, [bang]),
  599:     ReqId5 = erpc:send_request(Node1, ?MODULE, f, []),
  600: 
  601:     try
  602:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId4, 1000)
  603:     catch
  604:         error:{exception, bang, [{erlang,error,[bang],_}]} ->
  605:             ok
  606:     end,
  607:     try
  608:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId5, 10)
  609:     catch
  610:         error:{erpc, timeout} ->
  611:             ok
  612:     end,
  613: 
  614:     %% Test fast timeouts.
  615:     no_response = erpc:wait_response(ReqId2),
  616:     no_response = erpc:wait_response(ReqId2, 10),
  617: 
  618:     %% Let Node1 finish its work before yielding.
  619:     ct:sleep({seconds,2}),
  620:     {hej,_,Node1} = erpc:receive_response(ReqId1),
  621: 
  622:     %% Wait for the Node2 and Node3.
  623:     {response,{hej,_,Node2}} = erpc:wait_response(ReqId2, infinity),
  624:     {hej,_,Node3} = erpc:receive_response(ReqId3),
  625: 
  626:     try
  627:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId5, 10),
  628:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  629:     catch
  630:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
  631:             ok
  632:     end,
  633: 
  634:     receive
  635:         Msg0 -> ct:fail(Msg0)
  636:     after 0 -> ok
  637:     end,
  638: 
  639:     [] = flush([]),
  640: 
  641:     {ok, _Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(),
  642: 
  643:     ReqId6 = erpc:send_request(Node4, erlang, node, []),
  644:     
  645:     no_response = erpc:check_response({response, Node1}, ReqId6),
  646:     no_response = erpc:check_response(ReqId6, ReqId6),
  647:     receive
  648:         Msg1 ->
  649:             {response, Node4} = erpc:check_response(Msg1, ReqId6)
  650:     end,
  651: 
  652:     ReqId7 = erpc:send_request(Node4, erlang, halt, []),
  653:     try
  654:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId7),
  655:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  656:     catch
  657:         error:{erpc, noconnection} -> ok
  658:     end,
  659: 
  660:     ReqId8 = erpc:send_request(Node4, erlang, node, []),
  661:     receive
  662:         Msg2 ->
  663:             try
  664:                 erpc:check_response(Msg2, ReqId8),
  665:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  666:             catch
  667:                 error:{erpc, noconnection} ->
  668:                     ok
  669:             end
  670:     end,
  671: 
  672:     [] = flush([]),
  673: 
  674:     {ok, Node5} = start_ei_node(Config),
  675:     %% Once when erpc:send_request() brings up the connection
  676:     %% and once when the connection is up...
  677:     disconnect(Node5),
  678:     ReqId14 = erpc:send_request(Node5, erlang, node, []),
  679:     try
  680:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId14),
  681:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  682:     catch
  683:         error:{erpc, notsup} -> ok
  684:     end,
  685:     true = lists:member(Node5, nodes(hidden)),
  686:     ReqId15 = erpc:send_request(Node5, erlang, node, []),
  687:     try
  688:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId15),
  689:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  690:     catch
  691:         error:{erpc, notsup} -> ok
  692:     end,
  693: 
  694:     ok = stop_ei_node(Node5),
  695: 
  696:     [] = flush([]),
  697: 
  698:     {OldRelName, OldRel} = old_release(),
  699:     case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0},
  700:                       OldRelName,
  701:                       proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
  702:         not_available ->
  703:             {comment, "Not tested against OTP "++OldRel++" node"};
  704:         {ok, _OldPeer, OldNode} ->
  705: 
  706:             ReqId9 = erpc:send_request(OldNode, erlang, node, []),
  707:     
  708:             no_response = erpc:check_response({response, OldNode}, ReqId9),
  709:             no_response = erpc:check_response(ReqId6, ReqId9),
  710:             receive
  711:                 Msg3 ->
  712:                     {response, OldNode} = erpc:check_response(Msg3, ReqId9)
  713:             end,
  714: 
  715:             ReqId10 = erpc:send_request(OldNode, erlang, node, []),
  716:                         
  717:             OldNode = erpc:receive_response(ReqId10),
  718: 
  719:             ReqId11 = erpc:send_request(OldNode, erlang, node, []),
  720:             {response, OldNode} = erpc:wait_response(ReqId11, infinity),
  721: 
  722:             ReqId12 = erpc:send_request(OldNode, erlang, halt, []),
  723:             try
  724:                 erpc:receive_response(ReqId12),
  725:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  726:             catch
  727:                 error:{erpc, noconnection} -> ok
  728:             end,
  729: 
  730:             ReqId13 = erpc:send_request(OldNode, erlang, node, []),
  731:             receive
  732:                 Msg4 ->
  733:                     try
  734:                         erpc:check_response(Msg4, ReqId13),
  735:                         ct:fail(unexpected)
  736:                     catch
  737:                         error:{erpc, noconnection} ->
  738:                             ok
  739:                     end
  740:             end,
  741: 
  742:             [] = flush([]),
  743:             {comment, "Also tested against OTP "++OldRel++" node"}
  744:     end.
  745: 
  746: send_request_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  747:     %% Note: First part of nodename sets response delay in seconds.
  748:     {ok, _Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(["-erpc_test_delay", "1"]),
  749:     {ok, _Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(["-erpc_test_delay", "10"]),
  750:     {ok, _Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(["-erpc_test_delay", "20"]),
  751:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(Node1, fun () -> ?MODULE:f() end),
  752:     ReqId2 = erpc:send_request(Node2, fun () -> ?MODULE:f() end),
  753:     ReqId3 = erpc:send_request(Node3, fun () -> ?MODULE:f() end),
  754:     ReqId4 = erpc:send_request(Node1, fun () -> erlang:error(bang) end),
  755:     ReqId5 = erpc:send_request(Node1, fun () -> ?MODULE:f() end),
  756: 
  757:     try
  758:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId4, 1000)
  759:     catch
  760:         error:{exception, bang, [{?MODULE, _, _, _},
  761:                                  {erlang,apply,2,_}]} ->
  762:             ok
  763:     end,
  764:     try
  765:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId5, 10)
  766:     catch
  767:         error:{erpc, timeout} ->
  768:             ok
  769:     end,
  770: 
  771:     %% Test fast timeouts.
  772:     no_response = erpc:wait_response(ReqId2),
  773:     no_response = erpc:wait_response(ReqId2, 10),
  774: 
  775:     %% Let Node1 finish its work before yielding.
  776:     ct:sleep({seconds,2}),
  777:     {hej,_,Node1} = erpc:receive_response(ReqId1),
  778: 
  779:     %% Wait for the Node2 and Node3.
  780:     {response,{hej,_,Node2}} = erpc:wait_response(ReqId2, infinity),
  781:     {hej,_,Node3} = erpc:receive_response(ReqId3),
  782: 
  783:     try
  784:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId5, 10),
  785:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  786:     catch
  787:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
  788:             ok
  789:     end,
  790: 
  791:     receive
  792:         Msg0 -> ct:fail(Msg0)
  793:     after 0 -> ok
  794:     end,
  795: 
  796:     {ok, _Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(),
  797: 
  798:     ReqId6 = erpc:send_request(Node4, fun () -> erlang:node() end),
  799:     
  800:     no_response = erpc:check_response({response, Node1}, ReqId6),
  801:     no_response = erpc:check_response(ReqId6, ReqId6),
  802:     receive
  803:         Msg1 ->
  804:             {response, Node4} = erpc:check_response(Msg1, ReqId6)
  805:     end,
  806: 
  807:     ReqId7 = erpc:send_request(Node4, erlang, halt, []),
  808:     try
  809:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId7),
  810:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  811:     catch
  812:         error:{erpc, noconnection} -> ok
  813:     end,
  814: 
  815:     ReqId8 = erpc:send_request(Node4, erlang, node, []),
  816:     receive
  817:         Msg2 ->
  818:             try
  819:                 erpc:check_response(Msg2, ReqId8),
  820:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  821:             catch
  822:                 error:{erpc, noconnection} ->
  823:                     ok
  824:             end
  825:     end,
  826: 
  827:     [] = flush([]),
  828: 
  829:     {ok, Node5} = start_ei_node(Config),
  830:     %% Once when erpc:send_request() brings up the connection
  831:     %% and once when the connection is up...
  832:     disconnect(Node5),
  833:     ReqId9 = erpc:send_request(Node5, fun () -> erlang:node() end),
  834:     try
  835:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId9),
  836:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  837:     catch
  838:         error:{erpc, notsup} -> ok
  839:     end,
  840:     true = lists:member(Node5, nodes(hidden)),
  841:     ReqId10 = erpc:send_request(Node5, fun () -> erlang:node() end),
  842:     try
  843:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId10),
  844:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  845:     catch
  846:         error:{erpc, notsup} -> ok
  847:     end,
  848: 
  849:     ok = stop_ei_node(Node5).
  850: 
  851: 
  852: send_request_receive_reqtmo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  853:     Fun = fun (Node, SendMe, Timeout) ->
  854:                   RID = erpc:send_request(Node, erlang, send,
  855:                                           [self(), SendMe]),
  856:                   try
  857:                       erpc:receive_response(RID, Timeout),
  858:                       ct:fail(unexpected)
  859:                   catch
  860:                       error:{erpc, timeout} -> ok
  861:                   end
  862:           end,
  863:     reqtmo_test(Fun).
  864: 
  865: send_request_wait_reqtmo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  866:     Fun = fun (Node, SendMe, Timeout) ->
  867:                   RID = erpc:send_request(Node, erlang, send,
  868:                                           [self(), SendMe]),
  869:                   no_response = erpc:wait_response(RID, 0),
  870:                   no_response = erpc:wait_response(RID, Timeout),
  871:                   %% Cleanup...
  872:                   try
  873:                       erpc:receive_response(RID, 0),
  874:                       ct:fail(unexpected)
  875:                   catch
  876:                       error:{erpc, timeout} -> ok
  877:                   end
  878:           end,
  879:     reqtmo_test(Fun).
  880: 
  881: send_request_check_reqtmo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  882:     Fun = fun (Node, SendMe, Timeout) ->
  883:                   RID = erpc:send_request(Node, erlang, send,
  884:                                           [self(), SendMe]),
  885:                   receive Msg -> erpc:check_response(Msg, RID)
  886:                   after Timeout -> ok
  887:                   end,
  888:                   %% Cleanup...
  889:                   try
  890:                       erpc:receive_response(RID, 0),
  891:                       ct:fail(unexpected)
  892:                   catch
  893:                       error:{erpc, timeout} -> ok
  894:                   end
  895:           end,
  896:     reqtmo_test(Fun).
  897: 
  898: send_request_against_ei_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  899:     {ok, EiNode} = start_ei_node(Config),
  900:     %% Once when erpc:send_request() brings up the connection
  901:     %% and once when the connection is up...
  902:     disconnect(EiNode),
  903:     RID1 = erpc:send_request(EiNode, erlang, node, []),
  904:     RID2 = erpc:send_request(EiNode, erlang, node, []),
  905:     RID3 = erpc:send_request(EiNode, erlang, node, []),
  906:     try
  907:         erpc:receive_response(RID1),
  908:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  909:     catch
  910:         error:{erpc, notsup} ->
  911:             ok
  912:     end,
  913:     try
  914:         erpc:wait_response(RID2, infinity),
  915:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  916:     catch
  917:         error:{erpc, notsup} ->
  918:             ok
  919:     end,
  920:     try
  921:         receive
  922:             Msg ->
  923:                 erpc:check_response(Msg, RID3),
  924:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  925:         end
  926:     catch
  927:         error:{erpc, notsup} ->
  928:             ok
  929:     end,
  930: 
  931:     true = lists:member(EiNode, nodes(hidden)),
  932: 
  933:     RID1u = erpc:send_request(EiNode, erlang, node, []),
  934:     RID2u = erpc:send_request(EiNode, erlang, node, []),
  935:     RID3u = erpc:send_request(EiNode, erlang, node, []),
  936:     try
  937:         erpc:receive_response(RID1u),
  938:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  939:     catch
  940:         error:{erpc, notsup} ->
  941:             ok
  942:     end,
  943:     try
  944:         erpc:wait_response(RID2u, infinity),
  945:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  946:     catch
  947:         error:{erpc, notsup} ->
  948:             ok
  949:     end,
  950:     try
  951:         receive
  952:             Msgu ->
  953:                 erpc:check_response(Msgu, RID3u),
  954:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  955:         end
  956:     catch
  957:         error:{erpc, notsup} ->
  958:             ok
  959:     end,
  960:     
  961:     ok = stop_ei_node(EiNode).
  962: 
  963: send_request_receive_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  964:     {ok, _P, N} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
  965:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection_success(N),
  966:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection_timeout(N),
  967:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection_error(N),
  968:     ok.
  969: 
  970: send_request_receive_reqid_collection_success(N) ->
  971: 
  972:     ReqId0 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> 0 end),
  973: 
  974:     ReqIdC0 = erpc:reqids_new(),
  975: 
  976:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 400 -> 400 end end),
  977:     ReqIdC1 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  978:     1 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
  979: 
  980:     ReqIdC2 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 1 -> 1 end end, req2, ReqIdC1),
  981:     2 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
  982: 
  983:     ReqIdC3 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 200 -> 200 end end, req3, ReqIdC2),
  984:     3 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  985:     
  986:     {1, req2, ReqIdC4} = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC3, infinity, true),
  987:     2 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  988: 
  989:     {200, req3, ReqIdC5} = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC4, 7654, true),
  990:     1 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
  991: 
  992:     {400, req1, ReqIdC6} = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC5, 5000, true),
  993:     0 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
  994: 
  995:     no_request = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC6, 5000, true),
  996: 
  997:     0 = erpc:receive_response(ReqId0),
  998: 
  999:     ok.
 1000: 
 1001: send_request_receive_reqid_collection_timeout(N) ->
 1002: 
 1003:     ReqId0 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> 0 end),
 1004: 
 1005:     ReqIdC0 = erpc:reqids_new(),
 1006: 
 1007:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 1000 -> 1000 end end),
 1008:     ReqIdC1 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1009: 
 1010:     ReqIdC2 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 1 -> 1 end end, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1011: 
 1012:     ReqId3 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 500 -> 500 end end),
 1013:     ReqIdC3 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId3, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1014: 
 1015:     Deadline = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond) + 100,
 1016:     
 1017:     {1, req2, ReqIdC4} = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC3, {abs, Deadline}, true),
 1018:     2 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
 1019: 
 1020:     try not_valid = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline}, true)
 1021:     catch error:{erpc, timeout} -> ok
 1022:     end,
 1023: 
 1024:     Abandoned = lists:sort([{ReqId1, req1}, {ReqId3, req3}]),
 1025:     Abandoned = lists:sort(erpc:reqids_to_list(ReqIdC4)),
 1026: 
 1027:     %% Make sure requests were abandoned...
 1028:     try not_valid = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1000}, false)
 1029:     catch error:{erpc, timeout} -> ok
 1030:     end,
 1031: 
 1032:     0 = erpc:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
 1033: 
 1034:     ok.
 1035:     
 1036: send_request_receive_reqid_collection_error(N) ->
 1037: 
 1038:     ReqId0 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> 0 end),
 1039: 
 1040:     ReqIdC0 = erpc:reqids_new(),
 1041: 
 1042:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 600 -> 600 end end),
 1043:     ReqIdC1 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1044:     try
 1045:         nope = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId1, req2, ReqIdC1)
 1046:     catch
 1047:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
 1048:     end,
 1049: 
 1050:     ReqIdC2 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 800 -> erlang:halt() end end, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1051:     ReqIdC3 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 200 -> error(errored) end end, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1052:     ReqIdC4 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> exit(exited) end, req4, ReqIdC3),
 1053:     ReqIdC5 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 400 -> throw(thrown) end end, req5, ReqIdC4),
 1054: 
 1055:     5 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
 1056: 
 1057:     ReqIdC6 = try not_valid = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC5, infinity, true)
 1058:               catch exit:{{exception, exited}, req4, RIC6} -> RIC6
 1059:               end,
 1060: 
 1061:     4 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
 1062: 
 1063:     try not_valid = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC6, 2000, false)
 1064:     catch error:{{exception, errored, _Stk}, req3, _} -> ok
 1065:     end,
 1066: 
 1067:     try not_valid = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC6, infinity, false)
 1068:     catch throw:{thrown, req5, _} -> ok
 1069:     end,
 1070:     
 1071:     {600, req1, ReqIdC6} = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC6, infinity, false),
 1072: 
 1073:     try not_valid = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC6, 5000, false)
 1074:     catch error:{{erpc, noconnection}, req2, ReqIdC6} -> ok
 1075:     end,
 1076: 
 1077:     0 = erpc:receive_response(ReqId0),
 1078: 
 1079:     ok.
 1080: 
 1081: send_request_wait_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1082:     {ok, _P, N} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 1083:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection_success(N),
 1084:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection_timeout(N),
 1085:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection_error(N),
 1086:     ok.
 1087: 
 1088: send_request_wait_reqid_collection_success(N) ->
 1089: 
 1090:     ReqId0 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> 0 end),
 1091: 
 1092:     ReqIdC0 = erpc:reqids_new(),
 1093: 
 1094:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 400 -> 400 end end),
 1095:     ReqIdC1 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1096:     1 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
 1097: 
 1098:     ReqIdC2 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 1 -> 1 end end, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1099:     2 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
 1100: 
 1101:     ReqIdC3 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 200 -> 200 end end, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1102:     3 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
 1103:     
 1104:     {{response, 1}, req2, ReqIdC4} = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC3, infinity, true),
 1105:     2 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
 1106: 
 1107:     {{response, 200}, req3, ReqIdC5} = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC4, 7654, true),
 1108:     1 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
 1109: 
 1110:     {{response, 400}, req1, ReqIdC6} = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC5, 5000, true),
 1111:     0 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
 1112: 
 1113:     no_request = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC6, 5000, true),
 1114: 
 1115:     {response, 0} = erpc:wait_response(ReqId0),
 1116: 
 1117:     ok.
 1118: 
 1119: send_request_wait_reqid_collection_timeout(N) ->
 1120: 
 1121:     ReqId0 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> 0 end),
 1122: 
 1123:     ReqIdC0 = erpc:reqids_new(),
 1124: 
 1125:     ReqIdC0 = erpc:reqids_new(),
 1126: 
 1127:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 1000 -> 1000 end end),
 1128:     ReqIdC1 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1129: 
 1130:     ReqIdC2 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 1 -> 1 end end, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1131: 
 1132:     ReqId3 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 500 -> 500 end end),
 1133:     ReqIdC3 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId3, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1134: 
 1135:     Deadline = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond) + 100,
 1136:     
 1137:     {{response, 1}, req2, ReqIdC4} = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC3, {abs, Deadline}, true),
 1138:     2 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
 1139: 
 1140:     no_response = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline}, true),
 1141: 
 1142:     Unhandled = lists:sort([{ReqId1, req1}, {ReqId3, req3}]),
 1143:     Unhandled = lists:sort(erpc:reqids_to_list(ReqIdC4)),
 1144: 
 1145:     %% Make sure requests were not abandoned...
 1146:     {{response, 500}, req3, ReqIdC4} = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1500}, false),
 1147:     {{response, 1000}, req1, ReqIdC4} = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1500}, false),
 1148: 
 1149:     {response, 0} = erpc:wait_response(ReqId0, infinity),
 1150: 
 1151:     ok.
 1152:     
 1153: send_request_wait_reqid_collection_error(N) ->
 1154: 
 1155:     ReqId0 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> 0 end),
 1156: 
 1157:     ReqIdC0 = erpc:reqids_new(),
 1158: 
 1159:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 600 -> 600 end end),
 1160:     ReqIdC1 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1161:     try
 1162:         nope = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId1, req2, ReqIdC1)
 1163:     catch
 1164:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
 1165:     end,
 1166: 
 1167:     ReqIdC2 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 800 -> erlang:halt() end end, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1168:     ReqIdC3 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 200 -> error(errored) end end, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1169:     ReqIdC4 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> exit(exited) end, req4, ReqIdC3),
 1170:     ReqIdC5 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 400 -> throw(thrown) end end, req5, ReqIdC4),
 1171: 
 1172:     5 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
 1173: 
 1174:     ReqIdC6 = try not_valid = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC5, infinity, true)
 1175:               catch exit:{{exception, exited}, req4, RIC6} -> RIC6
 1176:               end,
 1177: 
 1178:     4 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
 1179: 
 1180:     try not_valid = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC6, 2000, false)
 1181:     catch error:{{exception, errored, _Stk}, req3, _} -> ok
 1182:     end,
 1183: 
 1184:     try not_valid = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC6, infinity, false)
 1185:     catch throw:{thrown, req5, _} -> ok
 1186:     end,
 1187:     
 1188:     {{response, 600}, req1, ReqIdC6} = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC6, infinity, false),
 1189: 
 1190:     try not_valid = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC6, 5000, false)
 1191:     catch error:{{erpc, noconnection}, req2, ReqIdC6} -> ok
 1192:     end,
 1193: 
 1194:     {response, 0} = erpc:wait_response(ReqId0),
 1195: 
 1196:     ok.
 1197: 
 1198: send_request_check_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1199:     {ok, _P, N} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 1200:     send_request_check_reqid_collection_success(N),
 1201:     send_request_check_reqid_collection_error(N),
 1202:     ok.
 1203: 
 1204: send_request_check_reqid_collection_success(N) ->
 1205: 
 1206:     ReqId0 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> 0 end),
 1207: 
 1208:     ReqIdC0 = erpc:reqids_new(),
 1209: 
 1210:     ReqIdC1 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 600 -> 600 end end, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1211:     1 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
 1212: 
 1213:     ReqId2 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 200 -> 200 end end),
 1214:     ReqIdC2 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId2, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1215:     2 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
 1216: 
 1217:     ReqIdC3 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 400 -> 400 end end, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1218:     3 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
 1219: 
 1220:     Msg0 = next_msg(),
 1221: 
 1222:     no_response = erpc:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC3, true),
 1223:     
 1224:     {{response, 200}, req2, ReqIdC4} = erpc:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC3, true),
 1225:     2 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
 1226: 
 1227:     {{response, 400}, req3, ReqIdC5} = erpc:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC4, true),
 1228:     1 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
 1229: 
 1230:     {{response, 600}, req1, ReqIdC6} = erpc:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC5, true),
 1231:     0 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
 1232: 
 1233:     no_request = erpc:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC6, true),
 1234: 
 1235:     {response, 0} = erpc:check_response(Msg0, ReqId0),
 1236: 
 1237:     ok.
 1238:     
 1239: send_request_check_reqid_collection_error(N) ->
 1240: 
 1241:     ReqId0 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> 0 end),
 1242: 
 1243:     ReqIdC0 = erpc:reqids_new(),
 1244: 
 1245:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 600 -> 600 end end),
 1246:     ReqIdC1 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1247: 
 1248:     ReqIdC2 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 800 -> erlang:halt() end end, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1249: 
 1250:     ReqIdC3 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 200 -> error(errored) end end, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1251: 
 1252:     ReqIdC4 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> exit(exited) end, req4, ReqIdC3),
 1253: 
 1254:     ReqIdC5 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 400 -> throw(thrown) end end, req5, ReqIdC4),
 1255: 
 1256:     5 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
 1257: 
 1258:     Msg0 = next_msg(),
 1259: 
 1260:     no_response = erpc:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC5, true),
 1261: 
 1262:     ReqIdC6 = try not_valid = erpc:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC5, true)
 1263:               catch exit:{{exception, exited}, req4, RIC6} -> RIC6
 1264:               end,
 1265:     
 1266:     try not_valid = erpc:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC6, false)
 1267:     catch error:{{exception, errored, _Stk}, req3, ReqIdC6} -> ok
 1268:     end,
 1269: 
 1270:     try not_valid = erpc:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC6, false)
 1271:     catch throw:{thrown, req5, ReqIdC6} -> ok
 1272:     end,
 1273:     
 1274:     {{response, 600}, req1, ReqIdC6} = erpc:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC6, false),
 1275: 
 1276:     try not_valid = erpc:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC6, false)
 1277:     catch error:{{erpc, noconnection}, req2, ReqIdC6} -> ok
 1278:     end,
 1279: 
 1280:     {response, 0} = erpc:check_response(Msg0, ReqId0),
 1281: 
 1282:     ok.
 1283: 
 1284: multicall(Config) ->
 1285:     {ok, _Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 1286:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 1287:     {ok, Node3} = start_ei_node(Config),
 1288:     %% Test once when erpc:multicall() brings up the connection...
 1289:     disconnect(Node3),
 1290:     Node3Res = {error, {erpc, notsup}},
 1291:     {ok, _Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 1292:     {ok, _Peer5, Node5} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 1293:     {OldRelName, OldRel} = old_release(),
 1294:     {OldTested, {ok, _Peer6, Node6}}
 1295:         = case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0},
 1296:                             OldRelName,
 1297:                             proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
 1298:               not_available ->
 1299:                   {false, ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0})};
 1300:               {ok, _OldPeer, OldNode} = OldNodeRes ->
 1301:                   compile_and_load_on_node(OldNode),
 1302:                   {true, OldNodeRes}
 1303:           end,
 1304:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 1305:     io:format("Node1=~p~nNode2=~p~nNode3=~p~nNode4=~p~nNode5=~p~nNode6=~p~n",
 1306:               [Node1, Node2, Node3, Node4, Node5, Node6]),
 1307: 
 1308:     ThisNode = node(),
 1309:     Nodes = [ThisNode, Node1, Node2, Node3, Node4, Node5],
 1310:     
 1311:     [{ok, ThisNode},
 1312:      {ok, Node1},
 1313:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1314:      Node3Res,
 1315:      {ok, Node4},
 1316:      {ok, Node5},
 1317:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1318:      {ok, Node6}]
 1319:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes ++ [badnodename] ++ [Node6], erlang, node, []),
 1320: 
 1321:     [{ok, ThisNode},
 1322:      {ok, Node1},
 1323:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1324:      Node3Res,
 1325:      {ok, Node4},
 1326:      {ok, Node5},
 1327:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}}]
 1328:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes ++ [badnodename], fun () -> erlang:node() end),
 1329: 
 1330:     try
 1331:         erpc:multicall(Nodes ++ [<<"badnodename">>], erlang, node, []),
 1332:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1333:     catch
 1334:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
 1335:             ok
 1336:     end,
 1337:     
 1338:     try
 1339:         erpc:multicall([Node1, Node2, Node3, Node4, Node5 | node()], erlang, node, []),
 1340:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1341:     catch
 1342:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
 1343:             ok
 1344:     end,
 1345:     
 1346:     
 1347:     try
 1348:         erpc:multicall(Nodes ++ [<<"badnodename">>], fun () -> erlang:node() end),
 1349:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1350:     catch
 1351:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
 1352:             ok
 1353:     end,
 1354: 
 1355:     try
 1356:         erpc:multicall(Nodes, fun (X) -> X end),
 1357:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1358:     catch
 1359:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
 1360:             ok
 1361:     end,
 1362: 
 1363:     [{ok, ThisNode},
 1364:      {ok, Node1},
 1365:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1366:      Node3Res,
 1367:      {ok, Node4},
 1368:      {ok, Node5},
 1369:      {ok, Node6}]
 1370:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes ++ [Node6], erlang, node, []),
 1371: 
 1372:     [{ok, ThisNode},
 1373:      {ok, Node1},
 1374:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1375:      Node3Res,
 1376:      {ok, Node4},
 1377:      {ok, Node5},
 1378:      {ok, Node6}]
 1379:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes ++ [Node6], erlang, node, [], 60000),
 1380: 
 1381:     [{throw, ThisNode},
 1382:      {throw, Node1},
 1383:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1384:      Node3Res,
 1385:      {throw, Node4},
 1386:      {throw, Node5}]
 1387:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes, fun () -> throw(erlang:node()) end),
 1388: 
 1389:     [{throw, ThisNode},
 1390:      {throw, Node1},
 1391:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1392:      Node3Res,
 1393:      {throw, Node4},
 1394:      {throw, Node5}]
 1395:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes,  fun () -> throw(erlang:node()) end, 60000),
 1396: 
 1397:     S0 = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1398:     [{error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1399:      {error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1400:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1401:      Node3Res,
 1402:      {error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1403:      {error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1404:      {error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1405: 
 1406:      {error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1407:      {error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1408:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1409:      Node3Res,
 1410:      {error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1411:      {error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1412:      {error, {erpc, timeout}}]
 1413:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes++[Node6]++Nodes++[Node6], timer, sleep, [2000], 500),
 1414:     E0 = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1415:     T0 = E0 - S0,
 1416:     io:format("T0=~p~n", [T0]),
 1417:     true = T0 < 1000,
 1418: 
 1419:     S1 = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1420:     [{ok, ok},
 1421:      {ok, ok},
 1422:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1423:      Node3Res,
 1424:      {ok, ok},
 1425:      {ok, ok},
 1426:      {ok, ok},
 1427:

 1430:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1431:      Node3Res,
 1432:      {ok, ok},
 1433:      {ok, ok},
 1434:      {ok, ok}]
 1435:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes++[Node6]++Nodes++[Node6], timer, sleep, [2000]),
 1436:     E1 = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1437:     T1 = E1 - S1,
 1438:     io:format("T1=~p~n", [T1]),
 1439:     true = T1 < 3000,
 1440: 
 1441:     S2 = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1442:     [{ok, ok},
 1443:      {ok, ok},
 1444:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1445:      Node3Res,
 1446:      {ok, ok},
 1447:      {ok, ok},
 1448:      {ok, ok},
 1449: 
 1450:      {ok, ok},
 1451:      {ok, ok},
 1452:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1453:      Node3Res,
 1454:      {ok, ok},
 1455:      {ok, ok},
 1456:      {ok, ok}]
 1457:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes++[Node6]++Nodes++[Node6], timer, sleep, [2000], 3000),
 1458:     E2 = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1459:     T2 = E2 - S2,
 1460:     io:format("T2=~p~n", [T2]),
 1461:     true = T2 < 3000,
 1462: 
 1463:     [{ok, ThisNode},
 1464:      {ok, Node1},
 1465:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1466:      Node3Res,
 1467:      {ok, Node4},
 1468:      {ok, Node5},
 1469:      {ok, Node6},
 1470: 
 1471:      {ok, ThisNode},
 1472:      {ok, Node1},
 1473:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1474:      Node3Res,
 1475:      {ok, Node4},
 1476:      {ok, Node5},
 1477:      {ok, Node6}]
 1478:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes++[Node6]++Nodes++[Node6], erlang, node, []),
 1479: 
 1480:     [{ok, ThisNode},
 1481:      {ok, Node1},
 1482:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1483:      Node3Res,
 1484:      {ok, Node4},
 1485:      {ok, Node5},
 1486:      {ok, Node6},
 1487: 
 1488:      {ok, ThisNode},
 1489:      {ok, Node1},
 1490:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1491:      Node3Res,
 1492:      {ok, Node4},
 1493:      {ok, Node5},
 1494:      {ok, Node6}]
 1495:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes++[Node6]++Nodes++[Node6], erlang, node, [], 60000),
 1496: 
 1497:     [{ok, ThisNode},
 1498:      {ok, Node1},
 1499:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1500:      Node3Res,
 1501:      {ok, Node4},
 1502:      {ok, Node5}]
 1503:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes, fun () -> erlang:node() end),
 1504:     
 1505:     [BlingError,
 1506:      BlingError,
 1507:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1508:      Node3Res,
 1509:      BlingError,
 1510:      BlingError,
 1511:      OldBlingError]
 1512:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes++[Node6], ?MODULE, call_func2, [bling]),
 1513: 
 1514:     [BlingError,
 1515:      BlingError,
 1516:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1517:      Node3Res,
 1518:      BlingError,
 1519:      BlingError,
 1520:      OldBlingError]
 1521:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes++[Node6], ?MODULE, call_func2, [bling], 60000),
 1522: 
 1523:     {error, {exception,
 1524:              bling,
 1525:              [{?MODULE, call_func3, A, _},
 1526:               {?MODULE, call_func2, 1, _}]}} = BlingError,
 1527:     true = (A == 1) orelse (A == [bling]),
 1528: 
 1529:     {error, {exception,
 1530:              bling,
 1531:              [{?MODULE, call_func3, OldA, _},
 1532:               {?MODULE, call_func2, 1, _}]}} = OldBlingError,
 1533:     true = (OldA == 1) orelse (OldA == [bling]),
 1534: 
 1535:     [{error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}},
 1536:      {error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}},
 1537:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1538:      Node3Res,
 1539:      {error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}},
 1540:      {error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}},
 1541:      {error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}}]
 1542:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes++[Node6], erlang, error, [blong]),
 1543: 
 1544:     [{error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}},
 1545:      {error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}},
 1546:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1547:      Node3Res,
 1548:      {error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}},
 1549:      {error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}},
 1550:      {error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}}]
 1551:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes++[Node6], erlang, error, [blong], 60000),
 1552: 
 1553:     SlowNode4 = fun () ->
 1554:                         case node() of
 1555:                             Node4 ->
 1556:                                 receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 1557:                                 slow;
 1558:                             ThisNode ->
 1559:                                 throw(fast);
 1560:                             _ ->
 1561:                                 fast
 1562:                            end
 1563:                 end,
 1564: 
 1565:     Start1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 1566:     [{throw, fast},
 1567:      {ok, fast},
 1568:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1569:      Node3Res,
 1570:      {error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1571:      {ok, fast}]
 1572:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes, erlang, apply, [SlowNode4, []], 500),
 1573: 
 1574:     End1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 1575: 
 1576:     Time1 = erlang:convert_time_unit(End1-Start1, native, millisecond),
 1577:     io:format("Time1 = ~p~n",[Time1]),
 1578:     true = Time1 >= 500,
 1579:     true = Time1 =< 1000,
 1580: 
 1581:     SlowThisNode = fun () ->
 1582:                            case node() of
 1583:                                ThisNode ->
 1584:                                    receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 1585:                                    slow;
 1586:                                Node4 ->
 1587:                                    throw(fast);
 1588:                                Node5 ->
 1589:                                    exit(fast);
 1590:                                _ ->
 1591:                                    fast
 1592:                            end
 1593:                    end,
 1594: 
 1595:     Start2 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 1596:     [{error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1597:      {ok, fast},
 1598:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1599:      Node3Res,
 1600:      {throw, fast},
 1601:      {exit, {exception, fast}}] = erpc:multicall(Nodes, SlowThisNode, 500),
 1602: 
 1603:     End2 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 1604: 
 1605:     Time2 = erlang:convert_time_unit(End2-Start2, native, millisecond),
 1606:     io:format("Time2 = ~p~n",[Time2]),
 1607:     true = Time2 >= 500,
 1608:     true = Time2 =< 1000,
 1609: 
 1610:     %% We should not get any stray messages due to timed out operations...
 1611:     receive Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected, Msg})
 1612:     after 1000 -> ok
 1613:     end,
 1614: 
 1615:     [{error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1616:      Node3Res,
 1617:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1618:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1619:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}}]
 1620:         = erpc:multicall([Node2, Node3, Node4, Node5, Node6], erlang, halt, []),
 1621: 
 1622:     [] = flush([]),
 1623: 
 1624:     ok = stop_ei_node(Node3),
 1625:     case OldTested of
 1626:         false ->
 1627:             {comment, "Not tested against OTP "++OldRel++" node"};
 1628:         true ->
 1629:             {comment, "Also tested against OTP "++OldRel++" node"}
 1630:     end.
 1631: 
 1632: multicall_reqtmo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1633:     {ok, Peer1, QuickNode1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1634:     {ok, Peer2, QuickNode2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1635:     Fun = fun (Node, SendMe, Timeout) ->
 1636:                   Me = self(),
 1637:                   SlowSend = fun () ->
 1638:                                      if node() == Node ->
 1639:                                              Me ! SendMe,
 1640:                                              done;
 1641:                                         true ->
 1642:                                              done
 1643:                                      end
 1644:                              end,
 1645:                   [{ok, done},{error,{erpc,timeout}},{ok, done}]
 1646:                       = erpc:multicall([QuickNode1, Node, QuickNode2],
 1647:                                         erlang, apply, [SlowSend, []],
 1648:                                         Timeout)
 1649:           end,
 1650:     Res = reqtmo_test(Fun),
 1651:     peer:stop(Peer1),
 1652:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 1653:     Res.
 1654: 
 1655: multicall_recv_opt(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1656:     Loops = 1000,
 1657:     HugeMsgQ = 500000,
 1658:     process_flag(message_queue_data, off_heap),
 1659:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1660:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1661:     ExpRes = [{ok, node()}, {ok, Node1}, {ok, Node2}],
 1662:     Nodes = [node(), Node1, Node2],
 1663:     Fun = fun () -> erlang:node() end,
 1664:     _Warmup = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Fun, infinity, Loops div 10),
 1665:     Empty = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Fun, infinity, Loops),
 1666:     io:format("Time with empty message queue: ~p microsecond~n",
 1667: 	      [erlang:convert_time_unit(Empty, native, microsecond)]),
 1668:     _ = [self() ! {msg,N} || N <- lists:seq(1, HugeMsgQ)],
 1669:     Huge = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Fun, infinity, Loops),
 1670:     io:format("Time with huge message queue: ~p microsecond~n",
 1671: 	      [erlang:convert_time_unit(Huge, native, microsecond)]),
 1672:     peer:stop(Peer1),
 1673:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 1674:     Q = Huge / Empty,
 1675:     HugeMsgQ = flush_msgq(),
 1676:     case Q > 10 of
 1677: 	true ->
 1678: 	    ct:fail({ratio, Q});
 1679: 	false ->
 1680: 	    {comment, "Ratio: "++erlang:float_to_list(Q)}
 1681:     end.
 1682: 
 1683: multicall_recv_opt2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1684:     Loops = 1000,
 1685:     HugeMsgQ = 500000,
 1686:     process_flag(message_queue_data, off_heap),
 1687:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1688:     peer:stop(Peer1),
 1689:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1690:     ExpRes = [{ok, node()}, {error, {erpc, noconnection}}, {ok, Node2}],
 1691:     Nodes = [node(), Node1, Node2],
 1692:     Fun = fun () -> erlang:node() end,
 1693:     _Warmup = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Fun, infinity, Loops div 10),
 1694:     Empty = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Fun, infinity, Loops),
 1695:     io:format("Time with empty message queue: ~p microsecond~n",
 1696: 	      [erlang:convert_time_unit(Empty, native, microsecond)]),
 1697:     _ = [self() ! {msg,N} || N <- lists:seq(1, HugeMsgQ)],
 1698:     Huge = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Fun, infinity, Loops),
 1699:     io:format("Time with huge message queue: ~p microsecond~n",
 1700: 	      [erlang:convert_time_unit(Huge, native, microsecond)]),
 1701:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 1702:     Q = Huge / Empty,
 1703:     HugeMsgQ = flush_msgq(),
 1704:     case Q > 10 of
 1705: 	true ->
 1706: 	    ct:fail({ratio, Q});
 1707: 	false ->
 1708: 	    {comment, "Ratio: "++erlang:float_to_list(Q)}
 1709:     end.
 1710: 
 1711: multicall_recv_opt3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1712:     Loops = 1000,
 1713:     HugeMsgQ = 500000,
 1714:     process_flag(message_queue_data, off_heap),
 1715:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1716:     peer:stop(Peer1),
 1717:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1718:     Nodes = [node(), Node1, Node2],
 1719:     Fun = fun () -> erlang:node() end,
 1720:     _Warmup = time_multicall(undefined, Nodes, Fun, infinity, Loops div 10),
 1721:     Empty = time_multicall(undefined, Nodes, Fun, infinity, Loops),
 1722:     io:format("Time with empty message queue: ~p microsecond~n",
 1723: 	      [erlang:convert_time_unit(Empty, native, microsecond)]),
 1724:     _ = [self() ! {msg,N} || N <- lists:seq(1, HugeMsgQ)],
 1725:     Huge = time_multicall(undefined, Nodes, Fun, 0, Loops),
 1726:     io:format("Time with huge message queue: ~p microsecond~n",
 1727: 	      [erlang:convert_time_unit(Huge, native, microsecond)]),
 1728:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 1729:     Q = Huge / Empty,
 1730:     HugeMsgQ = flush_msgq(),
 1731:     case Q > 10 of
 1732: 	true ->
 1733: 	    ct:fail({ratio, Q});
 1734: 	false ->
 1735: 	    {comment, "Ratio: "++erlang:float_to_list(Q)}
 1736:     end.
 1737: 
 1738: time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Fun, Tmo, Times) ->
 1739:     Start = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 1740:     ok = do_time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Fun, Tmo, Times),
 1741:     erlang:monotonic_time() - Start.
 1742: 
 1743: do_time_multicall(_Expect, _Nodes, _Fun, _Tmo, 0) ->
 1744:     ok;
 1745: do_time_multicall(undefined, Nodes, Fun, Tmo, N) ->
 1746:     _ = erpc:multicall(Nodes, Fun, Tmo),
 1747:     do_time_multicall(undefined, Nodes, Fun, Tmo, N-1);
 1748: do_time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Fun, Tmo, N) ->
 1749:     Expect = erpc:multicall(Nodes, Fun, Tmo),
 1750:     do_time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Fun, Tmo, N-1).
 1751: 
 1752: multicall_always_spawn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1753:     Replies1 = erpc:multicall([node(), node()], erlang, self, [],
 1754: 			      #{timeout => infinity,
 1755: 				always_spawn => false}),
 1756:     case lists:any(fun({ok, Pid}) -> self() =:= Pid end, Replies1) of
 1757: 	true ->
 1758: 	    Replies2 = erpc:multicall([node(), node()], erlang, self, [],
 1759: 				      #{timeout => infinity,
 1760: 					always_spawn => true}),
 1761: 	    false = lists:any(fun({ok, Pid}) -> self() =:= Pid end, Replies2),
 1762: 	    ok;
 1763: 	false ->
 1764: 	    {skip, all_local_calls_spawned}
 1765:     end.
 1766: 
 1767: multicast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1768:     {ok, _Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1769:     {OldRelName, OldRel} = old_release(),
 1770:     {OldTested, {ok, _OldPeer, OldNode}}
 1771:         = case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0},
 1772:                             OldRelName,
 1773:                             proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
 1774:               not_available ->
 1775:                   {false, ?CT_PEER()};
 1776:               {ok, _, _} = OldNodeRes ->
 1777:                   {true, OldNodeRes}
 1778:           end,
 1779:     Nodes = [node(), Node],
 1780:     try
 1781:         erpc:multicast(Nodes++[OldNode], erlang, send, hej),
 1782:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1783:     catch
 1784:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
 1785:     end,
 1786:     try
 1787:         erpc:multicast(node(), erlang, send, [hej]),
 1788:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1789:     catch
 1790:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
 1791:     end,
 1792:     try
 1793:         erpc:multicast([<<"node">>, Node], erlang, send, [hej]),
 1794:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1795:     catch
 1796:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
 1797:     end,
 1798:     try
 1799:         erpc:multicast(Nodes, "erlang", send, [hej]),
 1800:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1801:     catch
 1802:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
 1803:     end,
 1804:     try
 1805:         erpc:multicast(Nodes, erlang, make_ref(), [hej]),
 1806:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1807:     catch
 1808:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
 1809:     end,
 1810: 
 1811:     %% Silently fail...
 1812:     erpc:multicast([badnodename], erlang, send, [self(), blupp]),
 1813:     %% silent remote error...
 1814:     erpc:multicast(Nodes, erlang, send, [self()|blupp]),
 1815: 
 1816:     Me = self(),
 1817:     Ok1 = make_ref(),
 1818:     ok = erpc:multicast(Nodes++[OldNode], erlang, send, [Me, {mfa, Ok1}]),
 1819:     receive
 1820:         {mfa, Ok1} -> ok
 1821:     end,
 1822:     receive
 1823:         {mfa, Ok1} -> ok
 1824:     end,
 1825:     receive
 1826:         {mfa, Ok1} -> ok
 1827:     end,
 1828:     ok = erpc:multicast(Nodes, fun () -> Me ! {a_fun, Ok1} end),
 1829:     receive
 1830:         {a_fun, Ok1} -> ok
 1831:     end,
 1832:     receive
 1833:         {a_fun, Ok1} -> ok
 1834:     end,
 1835: 
 1836:     ok = erpc:multicast([Node, OldNode], erlang, halt, []),
 1837: 
 1838:     monitor_node(Node, true),
 1839:     receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end,
 1840:     monitor_node(OldNode, true),
 1841:     receive {nodedown, OldNode} -> ok end,
 1842: 
 1843:     ok = erpc:multicast([Node, OldNode], erlang, send, [Me, wont_reach_me]),
 1844: 
 1845:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 1846: 
 1847:     [] = flush([]),
 1848: 
 1849:     {ok, EiNode} = start_ei_node(Config),
 1850:     %% Test once when erpc:multicast() brings up the connection
 1851:     %% and once when the connection is up...
 1852:     disconnect(EiNode),
 1853: 
 1854:     ok = erpc:multicast([EiNode], erlang, send, [Me, wont_reach_me]),
 1855:     ok = erpc:multicast([EiNode], fun () -> Me ! wont_reach_me end),
 1856: 
 1857:     wait_until(fun () -> lists:member(EiNode, nodes(hidden)) end),
 1858: 
 1859:     ok = erpc:multicast([EiNode], erlang, send, [Me, wont_reach_me]),
 1860:     ok = erpc:multicast([EiNode], fun () -> Me ! wont_reach_me end),
 1861: 
 1862:     receive
 1863:         Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg})
 1864:     after
 1865:         2000 -> ok
 1866:     end,
 1867:     ok = stop_ei_node(EiNode),
 1868: 
 1869:     case OldTested of
 1870:         false ->
 1871:             {comment, "Not tested against OTP "++OldRel++" node"};
 1872:         true ->
 1873:             {comment, "Also tested against OTP "++OldRel++" node"}
 1874:     end.
 1875: 
 1876: 
 1877: timeout_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1878:     Node = node(),
 1879:     MaxTmo = (1 bsl 32) - 1,
 1880:     erlang:send_after(100, self(), dummy_message),
 1881:     try
 1882:         receive
 1883:             M ->
 1884:                 M
 1885:         after MaxTmo + 1 ->
 1886:                 ok
 1887:         end,
 1888:         ct:fail("The ?MAX_INT_TIMEOUT define in erpc.erl needs "
 1889:                 "to be updated to reflect max timeout value "
 1890:                 "in a receive/after...")
 1891:     catch
 1892:         error:timeout_value ->
 1893:             ok
 1894:     end,
 1895:     Node = erpc:call(Node, erlang, node, [], MaxTmo),
 1896:     try
 1897:         erpc:call(node(), erlang, node, [], MaxTmo+1),
 1898:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1899:     catch
 1900:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
 1901:             ok
 1902:     end,
 1903:     [{ok,Node}] = erpc:multicall([Node], erlang, node, [], MaxTmo),
 1904:     try
 1905:         erpc:multicall([Node], erlang, node, [], MaxTmo+1),
 1906:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1907:     catch
 1908:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
 1909:             ok
 1910:     end,
 1911:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(Node, erlang, node, []),
 1912:     Node = erpc:receive_response(ReqId1, MaxTmo),
 1913:     ReqId2 = erpc:send_request(Node, erlang, node, []),
 1914:     try
 1915:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId2, MaxTmo+1),
 1916:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1917:     catch
 1918:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
 1919:             ok
 1920:     end,
 1921:     ReqId3 = erpc:send_request(Node, erlang, node, []),
 1922:     Node = erpc:receive_response(ReqId3, MaxTmo),
 1923:     ReqId4 = erpc:send_request(Node, erlang, node, []),
 1924:     try
 1925:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId4, MaxTmo+1),
 1926:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1927:     catch
 1928:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
 1929:             ok
 1930:     end,
 1931:     ok.
 1932:     
 1933: 
 1934: %%%
 1935: %%% Utility functions.
 1936: %%%
 1937: 
 1938: wait_until(Fun) ->
 1939:     case (catch Fun()) of
 1940:         true ->
 1941:             ok;
 1942:         _ ->
 1943:             receive after 100 -> ok end,
 1944:             wait_until(Fun)
 1945:     end.
 1946: 
 1947: old_release() ->
 1948:     OldRel = integer_to_list(list_to_integer(erlang:system_info(otp_release))-2),
 1949:     {OldRel++"_latest", OldRel}.
 1950: 
 1951: compile_and_load_on_node(Node) ->
 1952:     %% Recompile erpc_SUITE on the old node and load it...
 1953:     SrcFile = filename:rootname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ ".erl",
 1954:     {ok, ?MODULE, BeamCode} = erpc:call(Node, compile, file,
 1955:                                         [SrcFile, [binary]]),
 1956:     {module, ?MODULE} = erpc:call(Node, code, load_binary,
 1957:                                   [?MODULE, SrcFile, BeamCode]).
 1958: 
 1959: start_ei_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1960:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1961:     Suffix = case os:type() of
 1962:                  {win32, _} -> ".exe";
 1963:                  _ -> ""
 1964:              end,
 1965:     FwdNodeExe = filename:join(DataDir, "fwd_node"++Suffix),
 1966:     Name = atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 1967:         ++ "-" ++ "ei_node"
 1968:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:system_time(second))
 1969:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:unique_integer([positive])),
 1970:     Cookie = atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie()),
 1971:     HostName = get_hostname(),
 1972:     Node = list_to_atom(Name++"@"++HostName),
 1973:     Creation = integer_to_list(rand:uniform((1 bsl 15) - 4) + 3),
 1974:     Parent = self(),
 1975:     Pid = spawn_link(fun () ->
 1976:                              register(cnode_forward_receiver, self()),
 1977:                              process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1978:                              Args = ["-sname", Name,
 1979:                                      "-cookie", Cookie,
 1980:                                      "-creation", Creation],
 1981:                              io:format("Starting ei_node: ~p ~p~n",
 1982:                                        [FwdNodeExe, Args]),
 1983:                              Port = erlang:open_port({spawn_executable, FwdNodeExe},
 1984:                                                      [use_stdio, {args, Args}]),
 1985:                              receive
 1986:                                  {Port, {data, "accepting"}} -> ok
 1987:                              end,
 1988:                              ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port)
 1989:                      end),
 1990:     put({ei_node_handler, Node}, Pid),
 1991:     case check_ei_node(Node) of
 1992:         ok -> {ok, Node};
 1993:         Error -> Error
 1994:     end.
 1995: 
 1996: check_ei_node(Node) ->
 1997:     Key = {ei_node_handler, Node},
 1998:     case get(Key) of
 1999:         undefined ->
 2000:             {error, no_handler};
 2001:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 2002:             Pid ! {check_node, self()},
 2003:             receive
 2004:                 {check_node, Pid, Res} ->
 2005:                     Res
 2006:             after 3000 ->
 2007:                     {error, no_handler_response}
 2008:             end
 2009:     end.
 2010: 
 2011: stop_ei_node(Node) ->
 2012:     case check_ei_node(Node) of
 2013:         ok ->
 2014:             Key = {ei_node_handler, Node},
 2015:             case get(Key) of
 2016:                 undefined ->
 2017:                     {error, no_handler};
 2018:                 Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 2019:                     Pid ! {stop_node, self()},
 2020:                     receive
 2021:                         {stop_node, Pid} ->
 2022:                             put(Key, undefined),
 2023:                             ok
 2024:                     after 2000 ->
 2025:                             {error, no_handler_response}
 2026:                     end
 2027:             end;
 2028:         Error ->
 2029:             Error
 2030:     end.
 2031: 
 2032: ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port) ->
 2033:     receive
 2034:         {'EXIT', Parent, Reason} ->
 2035:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 2036:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 2037:             exit(Reason);
 2038:         {stop_node, Parent} ->
 2039:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 2040:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 2041:             Parent ! {stop_node, self()},
 2042:             exit(normal);
 2043:         {check_node, Parent} ->
 2044:             Ref = make_ref(),
 2045:             {a_name, Node} ! Ref,
 2046:             receive
 2047:                 Ref ->
 2048:                     Parent ! {check_node, self(), ok}
 2049:             after
 2050:                 2000 ->
 2051:                     Parent ! {check_node, self(), {error, no_node_response}}
 2052:             end;
 2053:         Msg ->
 2054:             Msgs = fetch_all_messages([Msg]),
 2055:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 2056:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 2057:             exit({ei_node_handler, Node, unexpected_messages, Msgs})
 2058:     end,
 2059:     ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port).
 2060: 
 2061: get_hostname() ->
 2062:     get_hostname(atom_to_list(node())).
 2063: 
 2064: get_hostname([$@ | HostName]) ->
 2065:     HostName;
 2066: get_hostname([_ | Rest]) ->
 2067:     get_hostname(Rest).
 2068: 
 2069: flush(L) ->
 2070:     receive
 2071: 	M ->
 2072: 	    flush([M|L])
 2073:     after 0 ->
 2074: 	    L
 2075:     end.
 2076: 
 2077: disconnect(Node) ->
 2078:     case lists:member(Node, nodes([visible, hidden])) of
 2079:         false ->
 2080:             ok;
 2081:         true ->
 2082:             monitor_node(Node, true),
 2083:             true = erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 2084:             receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end,
 2085:             false = lists:member(Node, nodes([visible, hidden])),                
 2086:             ok
 2087:     end.
 2088: 
 2089: t() ->
 2090:     Delay = case init:get_argument(erpc_test_delay) of
 2091:                 {ok,[[D]]} -> list_to_integer(D);
 2092:                 _ -> 0
 2093:             end,
 2094:     1000*Delay.
 2095: 
 2096: f() ->
 2097:     timer:sleep(T=t()),
 2098:     spawn(?MODULE, f2, []),
 2099:     {hej,T,node()}.
 2100: 
 2101: f2() ->
 2102:     timer:sleep(500),
 2103:     halt().
 2104: 
 2105: next_msg() ->
 2106:     receive M -> M end.
 2107: 
 2108: flush_msgq() ->
 2109:     flush_msgq(0).
 2110: flush_msgq(N) ->
 2111:     receive
 2112: 	_ ->
 2113: 	    flush_msgq(N+1)
 2114:     after 0 ->
 2115: 	    N
 2116:     end.
 2117: 
 2118: fetch_all_messages(Msgs) ->
 2119:     receive
 2120:         Msg ->
 2121:             fetch_all_messages([Msg|Msgs])
 2122:     after
 2123:         0 ->
 2124:             Msgs
 2125:     end.
